channel.title: Having trouble making a web client for my server. ClassNotFoundException
channel.description:
Can someone please assist me or teamview me to help me get my web client going. I have signed and jar'd my client properly and have everything in the C:/ drive like the cache and everything. I pasted this code on my website [code]<html> <body> <body bgcolor="black"> <title>LostRealm718 Webclient</title> <applet name=client width=100% height=100% archive 'https://www.dropbox.com/s/sbla3iyw5kb532p/Client.jar' code='Loader.class'> </applet> </body> </html>[/code] and it seems to not be able to understand the Loader.class part or it can't find it.
I tried putting the actual loader.class file into my C:/ drive but it didn't seem to help any.
oh and sorry I just noticed this was the server section, can someone move it to the client section.
